title: Bard in the jungle.
body: Do you think Bard will be able to be picked for jungling? He seems to have a bunch of high utility skills which would be useful. CC, healing, movement, bit of damage bonus. I'd be worried about his clear rate, but otherwise could be great? Thoughts?

replies.body:
Obligatory "I am not a game designer" first!

My feeling is that Bard will end up being a passable jungler, who will really struggle to get started in his first few clears. I'm actually looking forward to see if he has more impact in changing the typical flow of jungling, rather than being a teams solo jungler himself. 

For example, Bard seems like he could help weaker Junglers in their early clear, while picking up experience from Chimes to not fall behind too hard, and bringing a really brutal first gank to a lane (Magical Journey + Cosmic Binding @ Bard Level 2 / Jungler 3/4 - doubleganking with the jungler)

This could work really well with a laneswap for example, allowing the ADC to lane more safely lane vs the top laner. I'm pretty excited to see if any new team layouts come from him. :D
That's true. I guess we'll see how it turns out after a few weeks. Looking forward to it!
